definition: to regard as/to figure/to calculate/to compute

sentences.english: AS the Nomogram was made, it provided a more simple and convenient method for estimating the lean yield.
sentences.chinese: 列线图的制作为估算瘦肉量提供了更简便的方法。

sentences.english: At present, China's commercial banks is also difficult to accurately estimate the expected loss of non-lending.
sentences.chinese: 目前，我国商业银行还难以准确估算贷款非预期损失。

sentences.english: The first thing to deal with for the coming month is your overall income.
sentences.chinese: 你要做的第一件事就是估算你全部的工资收入。

sentences.english: We now have a pessimistic but not impossible estimate.
sentences.chinese: 我们现在有了一个悲观但并非不可能的估算。

sentences.english: Non-Linear Least Squares were used to estimate the exponential time model.
sentences.chinese: 非线性最小二乘法用于估算指数时间模型。

sentences.english: This paper presents an improved scheme of rotor position estimation for PMSM.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种永磁同步电动机转子位置估算的改进方法。

sentences.english: By some estimates, half of Chinese GDP is linked to real-estate activity.
sentences.chinese: 据估算，中国GDP的一半都与房地产活动有关。

sentences.english: Then, rainfall estimated by radar data is inverted from the sequence of Z-I relation.
sentences.chinese: 然后，用这组关系得到降雨的雷达估算值。

sentences.english: A simple method for the estimation of the transverse shielding for intense- beam proton linac was described briefly.
sentences.chinese: 叙述了估算强流质子直线加速器横向屏蔽的方法。

sentences.english: By means of the formula, mixed-mode fatigue thresholds of the material can be calculated.
sentences.chinese: 依此式可以估算各种复合比加载条件下的疲劳门槛限。

sentences.english: His quirky study uses a famous maths formula called The Drake Equation, which was first used to estimate the existence of extra-terrestrial life。
sentences.chinese: 这一公式最初被用于估算外星生命存在的几率。

sentences.english: Estimate the cost of these measures, and the original and resultant sound levels.
sentences.chinese: 估算该测试花费以及测试前后声级值。

sentences.english: Precise and predictable patterns of this MEFP design allow the agile LAM to use aim point selection for precision effects and minimum collateral damage.
sentences.chinese: 在选择当中自主估算精确效果和最小量连带损害值。

sentences.english: The structure cost model is most important part.
sentences.chinese: 构造性成本模型是软件估算中最主要的部门。

sentences.english: The first estimate shall be submitted within 42 days after the Commencement Date.
sentences.chinese: 每一次估算应在开工日期后42天内提交。

definition: to convert/conversion/(in accounting, referring to currency conversion) translation
